verses.roman:
īśvarera kṛpā-leśa haya ta' yāhāre
sei ta' īśvara-tattva jānibāre pāre

synonyms: īśvarera—of the Personality of Godhead; kṛpā-leśa—a little mercy; haya—there is; ta'-certainly; yāhāre—upon whom; sei ta'-he certainly; īśvara-tattva—the Absolute Truth; jānibāre—to know; pāre—is able.
translation: The Ācārya continued, "If one receives but a tiny bit of the Lord's favor by dint of devotional service, he can understand the nature of the Supreme Personality of Godhead.
